alert.note: Alert for Lower Kobuk and Noatak Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 3:41PM AKST until March 01 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Lower Kobuk and Noatak Valleys south of Noatak. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are increasing this morning with minor blowing snow. Low visibility in blowing snow will develop this afternoon as falling snow develops and winds increase. The lowest visibility will be south of Noatak.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
